assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures were followed in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000. Informed consent was obtained from all participants for being included in this study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
